# <a name="insert-a-picture-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="4ff54-102">Pildi lisamine Outlooki veebirakenduses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4ff54-102">Insert a picture in Outlook on the web</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4ff54-103">Kui soovite lisada pildi, mis kuvatakse teie meilisõnumi sisus, saate lisada Tekstisisese pildi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4ff54-103">If you want to add an image that displays in the body of your email, you can add an inline image.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="4ff54-104">Valige soovitud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4ff54-104">Select the</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="4ff54-105">Paani koostamise allservas olevate **piltide lisamine tekstisiseseks** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4ff54-105">**Insert pictures inline** at the bottom of the compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="4ff54-106">Liikuge sirvides oma arvutis oleva pildi asukohani, valige see ja seejärel valige **Ava**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4ff54-106">Browse to the location of the picture on your computer, select it, and then select **Open**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4ff54-107">Lisateavet muude võimaluste kohta oma sõnumi isikupärastamise kohta leiate teemast meilisõnumi [kohandamine Outlooki veebirakenduses](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4ff54-107">To learn about other ways to personalize your message, see [Customize your email message in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span></span>
